title: Russian soldier allegedly opens fire on Siberian base, killing 8
text:
Eight people were killed when a Russian soldier allegedly opened fire at a military base in Siberia.

The service member allegedly opened fire, killing two officers and six enlisted individuals, CNN reported Friday, citing a statement from Russia's Investigative Committee.

ADVERTISEMENT

The suspect, identified as Pvt. Ramil Shamsutdinov, was reportedly detained.

The shooting took place during a guard shift at around 6:20 p.m. local time, CNN reported, citing the country's defense ministry. Two people were hospitalized with non-life-threatening injuries.

An investigation is ongoing.
description: Eight people were killed when a Russian soldier allegedly opened fire at a military base in Siberia.
